item.title: Proposed name for 113th element a fulfilled wish for Japanese researchers - The Mainichi
item.description:
Proposed name for 113th element a fulfilled wish for Japanese researchers - The Mainichi

The naming of the atomic element 113 as "nihonium" by Japanese researchers signals a landmark achievement providing a breath of fresh air for Japan in the discovery and synthesis of new elements, which has been dominated by European and U.S. researchers.

item.title: Tokyo stocks drop at outset amid uncertainty over British referendum - The Mainichi
item.description:
Tokyo stocks drop at outset amid uncertainty over British referendum - The Mainichi

TOKYO (Kyodo) -- Tokyo stocks opened sharply lower Monday, with the Nikkei index dropping to a roughly one-month intraday low amid growing uncertainty over Britain's referendum on its EU membership later this month.
